definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (so on an Isr. scarab, Ganneau:JAS 1883, 156, No. 42)—
an Ephraimite, Ju Jdg 17:1, Jdg 17:4 (in Jdg 17:5 ff. Jdg 18:2 ff called [[מִיכָה]]).
a prophet, the son of Imlah (LXX Meixai/av), 1Ki 22:8–1Ki 22:26 (9 t.), ‖ 2Ch 18:7–2Ch 18:25 (7 t.) + v:2Ch 18:8 Qr (Kt [[מיכהו]]).
a contemp. of Jer., Je 36:11 ([[מִכָֽיְהוּ]]), v:Je 36:13.
